oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville City Teachers’ Association meeting at Maxwell House, with Mayor Ben West, 1953 March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the luncheon meeting of Nashville City Teachers’ Association with Mayor West, hosted at the Maxwell House, circa March 1953. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 2.5 x 2.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
